title: As Pension Funds Buy Bitcoin, A New Path In Its History Is Traced
description: We’ve seen waves of big institutional players adopt Bitcoin - even players that were traditionally conservative like pension funds.
content: A t-shirt reading 'Bitcoin Be Your Own Bank' inside a cryptocurrency exchange in Barcelona, Spain, ... More on Tuesday, Dec. 5, 2023. Bitcoin&nbsp;shrugged off a slide in global markets during a … [+5532 chars]
